item.description:
1. This Chase Bank Money 'Hack' Is Actually Check Fraud  CNET
  2. The real problem with the Chase "ATM glitch"  Axios
  3. Actually, Axios , the TikTok Check-Fraud Brigade Is Full of Brazen Criminals  National Review
  4. The Chase ATM 'glitch' that went viral is likely check fraud, bank says  USA TODAY
  5. Viral videos of people stealing money from Chase ATMs were just plain check fraud  CNN
